Package Model

Interface ModelFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
Model
public interface ModelFacade
Interface that allows managing the flights, reservations and accounts data

  • Method Details

    • getClosedDays

      String getClosedDays()
      Gets the closed days
      Returns:
      Closed days in formatted string

    • checkAuthentication

      boolean checkAuthentication(String username, String password)
      Validates the credentials inserted
      Parameters:
      username - Email of the user
      password - Password
      Returns:
      True if the credentials are valid, otherwise False

    • addClient

      void addClient(String email, String password) throws EmailAlreadyExistsException, NotAnEmailException
      Adds a client to the clients map
      Parameters:
      email - Email
      password - Password
      Throws:
      EmailAlreadyExistsException - There already is a client registered under that email
      NotAnEmailException - Invalid email format

    • getFlightsString

      String getFlightsString()
      Gets the flights existent in a formatted string
      Returns:
      String that holds the flights information

    • createFlight

      String createFlight(int nMaxPassengers, City origin, City destination)
      Creates a flight
      Parameters:
      nMaxPassengers - Maximum number of passengers
      origin - City of origin
      destination - City of destination
      Returns:
      ID of the flight generated

    • getReservationsStringFromUser

      String getReservationsStringFromUser(String s)
      Formats the reservations by a user to a string
      Parameters:
      s - User ID
      Returns:
      Formatted string with the reservations

    • removeReservationByClient

      void removeReservationByClient(String reservationID, String username) throws DoesntExistReservationFromClientException, DayHasPassedException
      Removes a reservation, by request of a client
      Parameters:
      reservationID - ID of the reservation
      username - Email of the client
      Throws:
      DoesntExistReservationFromClientException - Client doesn't have a reservation with that ID
      DayHasPassedException - The day has already passed

    • createReservation

      String createReservation(String clientID, Set<String> flightsID, LocalDate date) throws FlightDoesntExistException, UnavailableFlightException, OnlyClosedDaysException, DayHasPassedException
      Creates a reservation
      Parameters:
      clientID - ID of the client
      flightsID - List of flight IDS
      date - Date of the reservation
      Returns:
      Reservation code
      Throws:
      FlightDoesntExistException - A flight does not exist
      UnavailableFlightException - A flight is unavailable
      OnlyClosedDaysException - Selected date is a closed day
      DayHasPassedException - Selected date is in the past

    • createReservationGivenCities

      String createReservationGivenCities(String username, List<City> desiredCities, LocalDate begin, LocalDate end) throws OnlyClosedDaysException, UnavailableFlightException, FlightDoesntExistException, DayHasPassedException
      Creates reservations according to a list of cities
      Parameters:
      username - ID of the client
      desiredCities - Cities to travel through
      begin - Beginning of the date range
      end - End of the date range
      Returns:
      Reservation rode
      Throws:
      OnlyClosedDaysException - Exception to prevent a reservation on a closed day
      UnavailableFlightException - Exception to prevent a reservation of an unavailable flight
      FlightDoesntExistException - Exception to prevent a reservation of a non-existing flight
      DayHasPassedException - Exception to prevent a reservation on a past date

    • addClosedDay

      void addClosedDay(LocalDate date) throws AlreadyIsAClosedDayException, DayHasPassedException
      Adds a closed day, removing the flights on that day
      Parameters:
      date - Date
      Throws:
      AlreadyIsAClosedDayException - Already is a closed day
      DayHasPassedException - Exception to prevent a closed day insertion on a past date

    • removeClosedDay

      void removeClosedDay(LocalDate date) throws NotAClosedDayException, DayHasPassedException
      Removes a closed day
      Parameters:
      date - Date
      Throws:
      NotAClosedDayException - The date is not closed
      DayHasPassedException - The date has passed

    • getRoutes

      String getRoutes(City origin, City destination)
      Gets the possible routes between two cities
      Parameters:
      origin - Origin
      destination - Destination
      Returns:
      Formatted string with the options

    • serialize

      void serialize(String filepath) throws IOException
      Serializes the model to a filepath
      Parameters:
      filepath - Filepath
      Throws:
      IOException - File manipulation

    • deserialize

      static ModelFacade deserialize(String filepath) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Deserializes a model from a filepath
      Parameters:
      filepath - Filepath
      Returns:
      Model deserialized
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O errors from file manipulation
      ClassNotFoundException - The class of the serialized object cannot be found
